
# Abstract

Here I re-examine the analysis of Oeppen and Vaupel (2002)

# Analysis

-   Save`life_exp_analysis.qmd`.

```{r}
sumdat <- gapminder_unfiltered |>
  group_by(year, country) |>
  summarize(lifeExp = max(lifeExp)) |>
  ungroup() |>
  group_by(year) |>
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) |>
  ungroup()

```
